naslov: Kuća stara Novalja, 4 apartmana, pogled na more, parking (prodaja)
opis: Prodaje se kuća 1. red do mora u Staroj Novalji, idiličnom mjestu na otoku Pagu posvećenom obiteljskom turizmu. Kuća ima neometan, otvoreni pogled na more, od kojega se nalazi na 5 metara, s prekrasnom, velikom rivom. Imanje se sastoji od 2 objekta, terase, vrta i parkinga. Parking je vanjski te natkriven tendom, s 4 parkirnih mjesta. Na velikoj terasi postoji kamin te ljetna kuhinja s provedenim instalacijama struje i vode. Manji objekt je 1 luksuzan studio apartman prepun svjetlosti, okružen terasom s vanjskim tušem i s prekrasnim pogledom na more, sa staklenim stjenama koje omogućuju potpuno otvaranje apartmana sa svih strana. Sastoji se od dnevne prostorije s kuhinjom s velikim šankom i kupaone. Glavni objekt sastoji se od velike tehničke prostorije s vešerajem, velike konobe, 1 apartmana u prizemlju i 2 apartmana na 1. katu. Svi apartmani imaju prekrasan i otvoren pogled na more. Apartman u prizemlju ima oko 150 m2 i sastoji se od ulaznog hodnika, terase, dnevnog boravka s kaminom,  kuhinje i blagovaone, 3 spavaće sobe i 2 kupaone. Prvi apartman na katu ima oko 90m2 i sastoji se od ulaznog hodnika, dnevnog boravka, kuhinje i blagovaone, kupaone i velike terase. Drugi apartman na katu ima oko 90 m2 te se sastoji od ulaznog hodnika, dnevnog boravka, kuhinje i blagovaone, 2 spavaće sobe, kupaone i balkona. U dvorištu se nalaze palme, masline i cvijeće. U dvorištu ima mjesta za bazen. Stolarija je nova, s drvenim griljama. Uz kuću dolaze i 3 veza za brodove. _________________________ EN This house for sale is in 1st row to the sea in Stara Novalja, an idyllic place on the island of Pag dedicated to family tourism. The house has an unobstructed, open view of the sea, with a beach 5 meters away from the house. The property consists of 2 buildings, a terrace, a yard and a parking lot. The parking lot is outside and covered with an awning, with 4 parking spaces. On the large terrace there is a fireplace/grill and a summer kitchen with electricity and water installations. The smaller object is 1 luxurious studio apartment full of light, surrounded by a terrace with an outdoor shower and a beautiful view of the sea, with glass walls that allow the apartment to be completely opened from all sides. It consists of a living room with a kitchen with a large bar and a bathroom. The main building consists of a large technical room with a laundry room, a large tavern/cave, 1 apartment on the ground floor and 2 apartments on the 1st floor. All apartments have a beautiful and open view of the sea. The apartment on the ground floor is about 150 m2 and consists of an entrance hall, terrace, living room with fireplace, kitchen and dining room, 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The first apartment on the 1st floor is about 90m2 and consists of an entrance hall, living room, kitchen and dining room, bathroom and a large terrace. The second apartment on the 1st floor is about 90 m2 and consists of an entrance hall, living room, kitchen and dining room, 2 bedrooms, bathroom and balcony. There are palm trees, olive trees and flowers in the yard. There is enough space for a swimming pool in the yard. The windows are new, with wooden shutters. The house comes with 3 boat moorings.
